segments.text: I notice the water overflowing from the sink, creating a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just pouring out, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it's so wasteful to let the water run like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit annoyed at the whole situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she doesn't just turn off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting all wet and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone is going to slip and fall if they're not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she would pay more attention to what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a mess waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
